summary: Build a user-friendly, highly interactive website about ‚ÄúHeart Disease Classification From Echocardiogram Images Using Deep Learning‚Äù, including a unique site logo representing the owners Sonu and Kuldeep.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Unique medical-AI themed logo mark including the text ‚ÄúSonu‚Äù and ‚ÄúKuldeep‚Äù, clean vector/flat style, transparent background (sonu-kuldeep-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Favicon/app icon derived from the logo mark, simplified for small sizes, transparent background (sonu-kuldeep-favicon.dim_128x128.png)
- Hero illustration featuring echocardiogram/ultrasound waveform + subtle heart/cardiology elements, modern flat or soft-3D style, no text (echo-ai-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
- Subtle seamless background texture with abstract medical/AI motifs (grids, waveforms, nodes), very light, no text (medical-bg-texture.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Three simple icon illustrations representing: data, model, results; consistent style, no text (pipeline-icons-set.dim_384x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page interactive Rose Day greeting webpage with the recipient name shown exactly as ‚ÄúLavisha g üí´‚Äù and the sender name shown as ‚ÄúKuldeep‚Äù.

Add interactive, romantic UI elements appropriate for a Rose Day greeting (e.g., an animated rose/flower interaction, tap/click-to-reveal love notes, and a final wish/reveal moment) that work on both mobile and desktop.
Implement a cohesive romantic visual theme (warm rose/red, cream, rose-gold accents; soft gradients; elegant typography) and apply it consistently across layout, buttons, and interactive states.
Ensure the page is responsive and accessible: readable text contrast, keyboard operability for interactive elements, and sensible layout on small screens.
Add the required generated static images to the project and render them in the page UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not fetch images from the backend).

Replace the current Rose Day single-page experience with a user-friendly, interactive informational website about ‚ÄúHeart Disease Classification From Echocardiogram Images Using Deep Learning‚Äù (crediting MUHAMMAD RAOOF and MUHAMMAD MAHTAB on the page).

Implement a coherent, professional medical/AI visual theme (colors, typography, layout) appropriate for a healthcare deep-learning topic, and apply it consistently across the site (including backgrounds, sections, buttons, and interactive states).

Add user-friendly interactivity suitable for an informational research/topic site, including: (1) a sticky top navigation with smooth-scroll to sections, and (2) at least two interactive content patterns (e.g., accordion FAQs, tabs for ‚ÄúPipeline / Model / Results‚Äù, expandable cards, or a simple step-by-step pipeline reveal).
Create and integrate a unique site logo that represents the owners ‚ÄúSonu‚Äù and ‚ÄúKuldeep‚Äù, and display it in the site header and as a favicon/app icon.
Update the document metadata to match the new site (page title and any visible branding), removing the old Rose Day project name from the HTML title.

Add and use new generated static images for the new topic (hero/illustrations/backgrounds) from frontend/public/assets/generated, and ensure the UI references these new assets (do not fetch images from the backend).
Maintain responsiveness and accessibility for the new site: readable contrast, sensible spacing on small screens, and clear focus states for all interactive elements.
